paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.1318delC, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of note, some cancer-associated gene mutations identified in a single metastatic lesion, such as those in BRCA2 (c.1318delC, unique to L1)...

functional_data.summary: The functional impact of the BRCA2 variant is not detailed in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was detected in a single metastatic lesion.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the presence of a single BRCA2 variant in the text.
